phrases: That night, we had jammed until very late.
Our neighbors in the building came to complain...
as was to be expected.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
I am so sorry!
Will you please give me a break!
Do you know what time it is?
Yes, I am sorry!
This is the problem with young people.
We will be careful from now on.
Why do we always have trouble with apartment 707?
Now, now, Ms. Yamada.
We are not supposed to talk about that.
A murder?!
In this apartment?
Whoever lived here before us was murdered!
Who would you hear that from?
- Ms. Yamada! - Who is that?
I do not know!
An ageless woman!
In a nightgown, hair's done up in a twist, wearing a mountain of make-up!
Why is that?!
I wonder if she is entertaining some young man.
I really could not care less about Yamada!
But I am curious!
I wonder what he is like?
Do you think he is a bar host?
So this woman Yamada told you
that the person living here before us was murdered?!
Well no, she did not exactly say it like that.
Apparently they are not allowed to talk about it.
But she did say, there is always trouble with apartment 707!
So that is got to be it!
There was a murder case here!
Go to bed!
Did I say something I should not have?
Ah, but the rent here is really cheap, right?
It is not unthinkable.
See?
Do not you think so?
You do think so do not you?
Oh no, what am I going to do?
I am too scared to sleep alone!
Would you like me to sleep with you, Nana?
No way!
Thank you for your kindness, but I do have a boyfriend!
I was kidding.
I am sleeping in Nana's room tonight,
so you can have my bed, Nobu.
You have had a long day, traveling and all.
Oh, no problem.
I will just crash somewhere out here.
No, you cannot!
If you would just fall asleep on my bed,
then Nana will not have any other choice but to let me into her room.
Actually, she would never let me sleep with her unless something like that happened.
I see.
So that is it.
Well then, if you do not mind, I will take your bed.
Thank you!
Your bedroom's big, too.
Oh...
I have to work in the morning,
so I think I will just get my clothes ready, seeing as they all arrived safely.
- Work? - Yup.
Oh, right.
Then you have got an early morning.
Sorry for partying so late.
That is no problem.
I can sleep in a bit, too.
As long as I get there by around ten, I will be okay.
Besides, I had a really good time tonight!
I have never seen a live band up so close!
It was so exciting!
Wait until you see us with a drum and bass rhythm section.
You are not seen nothing yet.
You cannot really call us a band anyway, with just the two of us.
I cannot wait until we find other members and do a real gig.
Right.
New members.
I wish I could play the drums.
I am pretty good at the tambourine, though.
The tambourine?
You know.
They have always got them sitting around in the karaoke places.
Looks like a big ring.
I am pretty good.
I did not take you as one to have rhythm.
What?!
But actually I would really like Yasu on the drums.
You do not find a drummer like that just anywhere.
You mean that Yasu?
So Yasu's a drummer.
Then he should come out to Tokyo, too.
Yeah, but Yasu's got his work.
Besides, he told me he was not interested in gambling his life away trying to go pro.
Gambling?
Looking like that in a courtroom
seems a lot more like gambling if you ask me.
Then what about bass?
Who was on bass?
Is not that person interested in coming to Tokyo?
Well, the bass player was also in another band,
so he was not really an official member.
In another band?
He had another band back home
and used to come and help us out at gigs and stuff.
So that is fair game.
I guess Nana has not told you anything.
Yes?
About the band or anything.
Oh...
No.
Nana does not talk about herself much.
But having heard her sing today, I think I understand her a bit better.
She really came to Tokyo to become a professional musician.
Yeah, her dream is to be able to make a living by singing.
You know back home she had some die-hard fans.
She was pretty well known locally.
I cannot wait for Tokyo to listen to her.
Hey, I can help you find band members.
All you need is some members
and then she can start singing at nightclubs right away.
Then everyone will fall in love with Nana's voice.
Oh, and scouts will not leave her alone.
Hey Nana.
Are you awake?
No.
Come on, you are awake!
I am talking in my sleep.
My heart's beating so loud, I cannot sleep.
Are you that afraid of ghosts?
No, I am excited about something else now.
Huh?
Sorry to disappoint you, but I have no desire to hit on a woman.
No, it is not that either!
Would you shut up already?
I cannot sleep.
Do you want me to kick you out?
Hey Nana.
Do you want a tambourine player on your band?
No, I do not.
What are these palpitations?
I do not think I have ever felt this way before.
Looking for a drummer and bassist!
Want To join our band and go pro?
Those of you who like the Sex Pistols.
Ask the store clerk for details.
Looking for a drummer and bassist!
Want To join our band and go pro?
Those of you who like the Sex Pistols.
Ask the store clerk for details.
What is this?
Looking for a drummer and bassist!
Want To join our band and go pro?
Those of you who like the Sex Pistols.
Ask the store clerk for details.
Shoji!
You have come!
I was going to go to Jackson.
Want To come?
Sure, I will join you.
But what is this poster?
You made it, did not you?
This is your drawing.
These eyes.
Yup.
Do not you think they look just like Nana and Nobu?
Who is Nobu?
So she wants to make a living by singing.
Now that is a pretty big dream.
Do not you think?
I am so excited!
Yeah, I guess I can get into stories like that.
But I am not sure if it is going to be as easy as you think.
It will be okay!
Everything's been going my way since I got to Tokyo!
I do not think things going your way has all that much to do with it.
I know!
Let us go to karaoke tonight with Nana!
I want you to hear her sing.
I will play the tambourine!
Sorry man, I have got to work to midnight tonight.
Work again?
What are you working so much for?
Your parents send you money, do not they?
Not enough to live on.
When I start school, I will not have time to work.
I have got to save up while I can.
That is what you say.
You are not spending money on Sachiko, I hope!
Buying her Louis Vuitton bags and Prada shoes.
But she really likes these brands.
I am just kidding!
You are the one that keeps bringing her up!
I know, but I came all the way to Tokyo to be with you
and you spend all of your time working.
I just wish you would make some time for me.
Oh come on.
I do make time.
Like the other night.
You were the one that went home early.
You are the one that is not being considerate.
Why should I always have to adjust to your plans?
Uh, I hate to disturb you at a time like this, but your Jackson burger is ready.
- Koichi Sato! - Yes!
I have a favor to ask.
My friend is looking for some band members.
I wonder if you could put this up for me!
Hey Nana!
This place has nothing to do with that band.
Besides, it is a punk band.
But...
I do not mind.
Since you are a good customer.
Really?!
Thank you!
Then if anyone asks,
could you give me a call on my mobile?
I will write down my number here.
I have got to go to work now, so I am off.
I just remembered.
You sent me an email yesterday.
Huh?
Well, if it is not important, never mind.
It is just that I fell asleep without noticing it came.
Sorry.
Oh yeah, I did send one.
What did I write?
Shoji, I am on my way home.
Call me when you get off work.
I cannot believe it!
How could I half-consciously send a message like this?
It is proof I am taking Shoji for granted.
And I did not even remember sending it.
Shoji probably came over to see me before work
because he felt bad about not being able to call.
And look at me...
I just wish you would make some time for me.
Oh how selfish!
Am I self-centered or what?!
Why should I always have to adjust to your plans?
I am going to see Shoji at work on my way home!
And I am going to apologize.
Sincerely!
Excuse me...
I would not mind seeing him in a waiter's outfit anyway.
- I will wait for him to get off work, cheerfully!
- Um, hello...
- Then I will let Shoji take me to his place.
- Do you mind?
And we will make love and make up!
What a great plan, if I say so myself!
Hello.
Oh hello!
Can I help you with something?
I just saw the poster out front.
S-So soon?
And h-he is cute!
Things are really going my way, are not they?
Ahh...
Sorry, Shoji!
Plans for tonight have changed!
I will make it up, I promise!
May I take your plate?
Busy again.
This place really needs more help.
Shoji, we got some new help starting today.
- Well, that is good.
- Will you show her around?
Yes, sir!
And she is cute.
Shoji Endo.
Pleased to meet you!
My name is Sachiko Kawamura.
It is nice to meet you.
What did you say... your first name?
Sachiko.
Do you...
Do you like Louis Vuitton and Prada?
Huh?
Resume Date: March 10, 2001 Name: Shinichi Okazaki Birthdate: January 25 Age: 18 Sex: Male
You do not need a resume to apply to be in a band.
What are you trying to pull off?
Oh really?
I had him write one out anyway so you would know more about him.
How am I supposed to know a person from a piece of paper?
What are you doing?!
Can you just show me what is in your heart
and what you can do?
Cool!
You making fun of me?!
No, not at all!
I would not think of it.
You are just as cool as Nana said you were.
Yeah?
I do not think you had to burn it, though.
How cool would it be if you started a fire?
Please let me join your band!
If you are good.
So let me hear what you got.
Yes madam!
Hold on, cute boy!
Not here!
That ageless Ms. Yamada will be back at us!
Hey, how much can a bit of bass playing hurt?
Absolutely not!
Do you want to get kicked out?
We will both be thrown out on the street!
That is exactly what the Demon Lord wants!
Demon Lord?
Go find a studio then.
A studio?
I know a cheap practice studio nearby!
Really?
Hey, we could use you.
Let me ask if they have any vacancies.
I would be interested in listening to your guitar and vocals, too.
Oh, hello?
You sure he is eighteen?
He looks more like sixteen.
He is lying about his experience.
So you did read through his resume, after all.
Far out!
It is available!
So cute!
He would better not be in elementary school.
I have never been in a place like this before.
Okay then, you ready to play along with one of ours?
Huh?
But Shin does not know any of your songs...
He can look at the score sheet.
Sure thing.
You ready already?
Yes.
I will give it a try!
Okay.
One, two...
Awesome!
Awesome!
So great!
They are so tight!
You are not too bad, cute boy!
I am glad you did not just look the part!
What?
Ow!
Nana!
I am sorry, did I do something weird?
No, it is not that at all.
You just surprised us.
You are a lot better than we expected.
What do you think, Nana?
This kid's good.
Let us let him in, okay?
So, your name's, Shinichi.
Is that right?
Yes.
Name a guitarist you respect.
Ren Honjo!
Huh?
Ren Honjo?
You mean the Trapnest guitarist?
Yes.
Then we have something in common!
I like Trapnest, too!
I am even in their fan club!
Although I like Takumi.
Oh, is that so.
But I guess I am more of a Ren fan than a Trapnest fan, though.
I played guitar for a long time until I fell for Ren's music.
Then I started playing bass.
Huh?
But Ren plays guitar.
Takumi's on bass.
Did not you know?
Ren plays bass too.
Is that right?!
Ren does the bass on the Sex Pistols tribute album,
and it is just incredibly awesome!
Oh really.
I guess I need to do more research!
I see.
That makes sense.
Oh, did I throw you off?
I am sorry!
No.
Your bass is easy to sing with.
Will you join our band?
Yes, I would be happy to!
Your singing and Nobu-san's guitar gave me the shivers!
Oh but... there is one thing you have to promise me first.
If you cannot, then you are going to hafta decline right this moment.
Shin, do better than Ren.
Yes!
Of course, that is what I intend to do.
Is not that wonderful?
You found such a great bass player in such a short time!
And he is cute!
So who do you have to thank?
Hey, who do you have to thank?
What are you getting at?
You want a prize that badly?
Let us see, then...
Do not litter!
Thank you, Hachiko.
I-I thought you did not hit on women.
It is not right!
I have a boyfriend!
What is she getting all uptight about over a kiss?
It is not like she is a virgin.
You will never change.
Sorry, Shoji!
I just kissed someone other than you!
But she is a girl, so do not take it too hard, okay?
Wait...
This must look like I am following her.
Um...
Miss Kawamura...
I am not some molester.
Oh, Mr. Endo, it is you.
Sorry about that.
You scared me for a minute there.
This is a quiet street.
It is not safe walking alone.
But it is a shortcut to the station and if I do not hurry,
I will miss the last train.
Oh, me too.
Shall we run together then?
Yes!
You are not getting on the same train are you, Sachiko?
Oh, good.
I made it.
Do not tell me we are getting off at the same station, Sachiko.
Where are you getting off, Mr. Endo?
My stop's the third one.
How about you, Sachi...
Er, ah... Miss Kawamura?
Mine's the second stop.
Oh, uh, will you be okay walking home from the station?
Yes I will be fine.
I live right across from the station.
Is that so?
That is a relief then.
Thank you.
You are so kind, Mr. Endo.
Good night.
She is pretty cute, that Sachiko!
Quite a difference from the make-believe Sachiko!
This is not good!
I will hafta keep away from her!
That was so much fun!
Settle down!
You are making me cold!
D-D-Do not come onto this side of the bed!
Whose bed is this anyway?
If you do not like it, sleep on the floor!
There!
Come on!
There!
Hey!
I can tell you honestly now, my feelings of looking up to you,
it was quite a lot like falling in love.
I really was not ready to grow up.
Yet within the reality of being expected to fend for myself,
you always showed me the sweetest dreams.
It was like first love in its happiest moments.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
